text: Gianni Letta (born 15 April 1935) is an Italian journalist and politician. He is a close advisor of Silvio Berlusconi. He is a member of the advisory board of Goldman Sachs International. He was Secretary of the Council of Ministers three times: 1994-1995, 2001-2006 and 2008-2011. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Italian journalists Category:Politicians from Abruzzo
title: Gianni Letta
